clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fever.
findings: No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Mild inflammatory uptake in pancreas region.
Focal increased uptake in pancreas, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in pancreas with SUVmax 7.84.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
